description.value: Opponents that are dealt sneak attack damage by a rogue with this ability are affected by a targeted @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{Dispel Magic}, targeting the lowest-level spell effect active on the target. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue's level. A rogue must have the major magic rogue talent before choosing dispelling attack.
